page.title: 15 HEALTH cont.
page.content: The hospital administrator stresses that they are very short of money.He blames this entirely on the present government.The Royal Northern is a local hospital which enjoys a good relationship with the public.It is also one of the largest employers in the area. The hospital administrators job is to make sure that employees do their jobs well and efficiently.He also has to organise meals,bedding,plunbing etc. and indeed practically everything which is not the responsibility of the medical staff. The medical side is the main controller of what happens in the hospital.The senior doctor emphasises that the medical staff try,as far as possible,to work according to the patients' wishes.
